title: Publisher Rocket 2.0 - Inside Look at Self-Publishing Keyword Research

tactics.name: Keyword Analysis with Publisher Rocket
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify profitable keywords with high search volume and low competition.
steps: Analyze data including competitive score, Amazon searches, and average earnings
Prioritize keywords with competitive score <75 and >$100 monthly earnings
caveats: Low search volume despite high earnings may indicate niche opportunities
source_quotes: competitive score anything below 75 is really good

heuristics.name: Profitable Keyword Filter
heuristics.condition: If competitive score <75 and average monthly earnings >$100, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: average monthly earnings more than $100... competitive score below 75

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket receives regular updates from its developer
source_quotes: Dave is constantly updating it... updates coming out over the next little bit

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience pain points with constrained solutions
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances search volume with manageable competition
source_quotes: computer programming concepts that is a book I do have published
